Class BasicTaskEditorHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      dgantt.BasicTaskEditorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvancedTaskEditorHandler
public class BasicTaskEditorHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

Basic MouseAdapter for selecting, moving and resizing tasks. One task can be selected using the left-mouse button, and multiple tasks selected by holding down the control key when clicking. Single tasks can be moved and resized, and even moved to different rows. Multiple selected tasks can be moved, but the tasks can not change rows.

Depending on which Translator setters are overridden, the type of permitted edits can be controlled.

Current editing mode. Either NONE, RESIZE_START, RESIZE_END, MOVE or MULTIPLE.
